creator: syed.junaid@efi.com
text:
HTTP Status 500 - 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

fulfilling this request.

=========================================================================
And it keeps on in this stack trace loop forever before stopping with following 
stack overflow message.




root cause 

java.lang.StackOverflowError
	at org.apache.coyote.tomcat4.CoyoteRequest.setAttribute
(CoyoteRequest.java:1140)
	at org.apache.catalina.connector.RequestFacade.setAttribute(Unknown

===========================================================

Can you please guide me about the root cause of the problem

Please try to file the bug information accurately when you submit a bug.
This report would also need some kind of test case or explanation on how to 
reproduce the bug.
creator: remm@apache.org
remm@apache.org
text:
There is apparently a loop in the forwards, for some reason.
I tested with a simple JSP forward, and used a setAttribute call to make sure 
there wasn't an obvious bug in the Coyote adapter, and it worked fine.
I'll need a test case to investigate this further.
